QuestData.Title: Scrollhunters
QuestData.Description:
When they captured us, they took everything we had - including our wonderful scrolls!
Those naga witches are building storms. They try to hide what they do here, and seek power for their queen.
We see past their madness, they are driven for a purpose.
Retrieve our work from the Nazeshi Tempest-Wielders, else they may use them for nefarious gains.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Deyon on the northeastern side of Covescale Rise.
